text.section: All driver's permits shall automatically expire and be null and void on the driver's birthday after two (2) years from the date of issue.

A driver's permit may be; renewed for successive periods of twenty-four (24) months by the taxicab inspector upon application and compliance with the same terms and conditions as are prescribed for original applications and the issuance of original driver's permits; provided, the taxicab inspector may permit the filing of an abbreviated application for renewal which shall update the information required in the original application as specified by the taxicab inspector.
Each renewed driver's permit shall be applied for not less than ten (10) days before the expiration of his current permit.

The fee of two dollars ($2.00) for the renewal of a driver's permit shall be attached to the application for renewal. Beginning on January 1, 2011,, the cost of driver's renewal fee will increase to ten dollars ($10.00), and then on January 1, 2012, the amount will cap at twenty dollars ($20.00). (Code 1959 , §22-55; Ord. No. 2009-671, §§45, 46, 11-3-09)
